put.description: This API updates the view last accessed by the user in the module and department specified in the request.

post.description: This API stars a view, enabling quick access to the view.

get.summary: Get My preference for archived view
get.description: This API gets my preference for provided view.

parameters.name: departmentId
parameters.description: ID of the department from which the view's preference should be fetched.

schema.description: ID of the department from which the view's preference should be fetched.

patch.description: This API updates my preference for Archived Ticket view. Only createdTime, modifiedTime fields supported in Sort Field.

get.description: This API fetches the available select fields for specified module.
This API fetches the details of a particular custom view.

delete.description: This API deletes the custom view specified.

patch.description: This API updates the details of an existing custom view. The value of the department attribute can be a valid department ID or allDepartments. Similarly, the value of agents can be a valid agent ID or allAgents. If you want the custom view to be visible only to you, do not pass any attribute values in the API request. Either module or moduleMapping is mandatory (For old format: module should be given, for new format: moduleMapping should be given)

get.description: This API fetches the view last accessed by the user in the module and department specified in the request.

post.description: This API unstars a view, disabling quick access to the view.

put.description: This API helps reorder the starred views in a module.

get.summary: Get My preference for given view
get.description: This API gets my preference for provided view.

patch.summary: Update My preference for given view
patch.description: This API updates my preference for provided view.ReceivedIn update is supported for only Tickets Module.Sort Field update is not supported for @Accounts@,@Contacts@ module.

get.description: This API lists the different views configured for a specific module or for all modules in your help desk portal.

parameters.name: module
parameters.description: Module Name (for which the view configured and need to be fetched)

schema.description: Module Name (for which the view configured and need to be fetched)

post.description: This API creates a custom view based on the attribute values passed in the API request. The value of the department attribute can be a valid department ID or allDepartments. Similarly, the value of agents can be a valid agent ID or allAgents. If you want the custom view to be visible only to you, do not pass any attribute values in the API request. Either module or moduleMapping is mandatory (For old format: module should be given, for new format: moduleMapping should be given)

get.summary: Get Selected Slots Of The User For Specified Queue Mode
get.description: This API fetches the selected slots of the user for specified queue mode configured in your helpdesk.

put.summary: Update Slots To Be Listed For Specified Queue Mode
put.description: This API updates the selected slots of the user for specified queue mode configured in your helpdesk.

get.description: This API fetches the available select field for given view in given department.

put.description: This API updates the selected fields for given view in given department.Mandatory Columns For module is always required @tickets@ : @ticketNumber@, @contacts@ : @fullName@ ,@accounts@ : @accountName@, @products@ : @productName@, @contracts@ : @contractName@

get.summary: Get Slots For Specified Queue Mode
get.description: This API fetches the slots for specified queue mode configured in your helpdesk.
This API lists the starred views in a module. Number of resources in the starred view is displayed only for the Tickets module.

x-custom-parameters-attributes.descrption: Module associated with the view. Values allowed are:@tickets@, @tasks@, @contacts@, @accounts@, @activities@, @calls@, @events@ or @contracts@.

mode.name: mode
mode.description: Queue mode for which the ticket should be fetched.Values allowed are: @status@, @priority@, @crmContactType@, @dueInMinutes@.

schema.description: Queue mode for which the ticket should be fetched.Values allowed are: @status@, @priority@, @crmContactType@, @dueInMinutes@.

departmentId.name: departmentId
departmentId.description: ID of the department in which the view(s) is (are) configured.

schema.description: ID of the department in which the view(s) is (are) configured.
